title: Big Buck Bunny
author: Vlc Media Player
description:
Big Buck Bunny tells the story of a giant rabbit with a heart bigger than himself. When one sunny day three rodents rudely harass him, something snaps... and the rabbit ain't no bunny anymore! In the typical cartoon tradition he prepares the nasty rodents a comical revenge.

Licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution license
http://www.bigbuckbunny.org

title: The first Blender Open Movie from 2006
author: Blender Inc.
description: Experience the groundbreaking animation that started it all - Elephants Dream, Blender's first open movie project from 2006. This surreal journey follows two characters through a mechanical world, showcasing the incredible possibilities of open-source 3D animation. Created entirely with free software, this film revolutionized the animation industry by proving that professional-quality content could be produced using open tools. A must-watch for animation enthusiasts and tech innovators alike.
